mapper.sql:
select ai.issue_id from ( select aii.issue_id, aii.summary, concat(api.project_code,'-', aii.issue_num) as issue_num from agile_issue aii left join agile_project_info api on aii.project_id = api.project_id where aii.project_id = #{projectId} ) ai
AND ( ai.issue_num LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%' ,#{executionLogQueryVO.params}) ,'%') OR ai.summary LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{executionLogQueryVO.params}), '%') )
